name: Mall Parking Skill
description:
Navigate tight turns, reversing, junctions, slaloms, parked cars, barriers, ramps and jumps to find your parking spot in varied missions. Are your parking skills up to snuff? Can you park perfectly on every task? Show your driving prowess and prove yourself as a master car driver, able to find your way even in the most extreme situations.


FEATURES
> Best physics quality and controlling.
> Challenging, Difficulty incremented levels!
> Realistic 3d environment graphics and sound.
> Lovely car's background music.
